# removeItem(at:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the item at the specified index.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeItem(at index: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **index**: The zero-based index indicating which item to remove. Specifying `0` removes the item at the top of the menu. The index must be valid and non-negative.

## Adding and removing items

- **addItem(withTitle:)**: Adds an item with the specified title to the end of the menu.
- **addItems(withTitles:)**: Adds multiple items to the end of the menu.
- **insertItem(withTitle:at:)**: Inserts an item at the specified position in the menu.
- **removeItem(withTitle:)**: Removes the item with the specified title from the menu.
- **removeAllItems()**: Removes all items in the receiver’s item menu.
